content.rendered:
For those with a refined palate and an appreciation for fine sparkling wine! Experience the fusion of elegance and taste with the collaboration between renowned designer Georg Jensen and leading Australia sparkling winemakers, Heemskerk Wines. Enhance your gift with this specially curated hallmark cuvee, paired with the enduring style of a Georg Jensen wine stopper.

Presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon. Designed to complement our fresh flower and indoor plant range.

To order and receive this product, you must be over 18 years of age. You can only include alcohol/wine as an additional item with your flower purchase. Please note that purchasing alcohol separately from flowers is not allowed, as per Queensland Liquor Licensing laws.

Delivery calculated at checkout.
